com.box.sdk

Class BoxCollaboration

  • Object
    • BoxResource
      • BoxCollaboration

  • @BoxResourceType(value="collaboration")
public class BoxCollaboration
extends BoxResource
    Represents a collaboration between a user and another user or group. Collaborations are Box's equivalent of access control lists. They can be used to set and apply permissions for users or groups to folders.

    Unless otherwise noted, the methods in this class can throw an unchecked BoxAPIException (unchecked meaning that the compiler won't force you to handle it) if an error occurs. If you wish to implement custom error handling for errors related to the Box REST API, you should capture this exception explicitly.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        protected static BoxCollaboration.Info create(BoxAPIConnection api,
                                              JsonObject accessibleBy,
                                              JsonObject item,
                                              BoxCollaboration.Role role,
                                              Boolean notify,
                                              Boolean canViewPath)
        Create a new collaboration object.
        Parameters:
        api - the API connection used to make the request.
        accessibleBy - the JSON object describing who should be collaborated.
        item - the JSON object describing which item to collaborate.
        role - the role to give the collaborators.
        notify - the user/group should receive email notification of the collaboration or not.
        canViewPath - the view path collaboration feature is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        info about the new collaboration.

        Parameters:

        fileID - FileID of the associated file
        pageSize - page size for server pages of the Iterable
        fields - the optional fields to retrieve.
        Returns:
